column2: "Ne nda no mu na Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar fowee bae
column3: na Jehoiakim bɛyɛɛ n’akowaa mfe ebiasa: nna ɔdanee na ɔtseew no do etua."

column2: "Na EWURADZE somaa Kaldeafo ekuwekuw
column5: na Ammonmba ekuwekuw wɔ no do
column6: na ɔsomaa hɔn wɔ Juda do dɛ wɔnkɛsɛɛ no
column7: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm a ɔnam no nkowaa nkɔnhyɛfo no do kae no tse."

column2: "Nyew
column3: ɔnam EWURADZE ne mbrasɛm do na iyi baa Juda do
column4: dɛ orutu hɔn efi n’enyi do
column6: dɛ mbrɛ dza ɔyɛe nyinara tse;"

column2: "na eso osian bɔgya a odzi bem a ɔkae gui ntsi; osiandɛ ɔdze bɔgya a odzi bem hyɛɛ Jerusalɛm ma: na EWURADZE ammpɛ dɛ ɔdze kyɛ."
"Afei Jehoiakim no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column4: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Juda ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Nna Jehoiakim kɔr ne nsamankyir: na ne babanyin Jehoiakin dzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."
"Na Egypthen no annda ho ara emmfi n’asaase do ammba bio: osiandɛ Babilɔnhen agye fi Egypt ɔwora ho kodu esutsen Eufrates ho
"Aber a Jehoiakin hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe duawɔtwe; na odzii hen abosoom ebiasa wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin dze Nehusita
column3: Elnatan a ofi Jerusalɛm ne babaa a."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ n’egya yɛe no nyinara."

column2: "Aber no mu na Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar no nkowaa tui baa Jerusalɛm
column3: na wobotui hyɛɛ kurow no do."

column2: "Na Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar baa kurow no do
column3: aber a no nkowaa no worutua no no;"

column2: "na Judahen Jehoiakin fiir edzi kɔr Babilɔnhen no nkyɛn
column6: na n’asafohemfo na ne mpanyimfo: na Babilɔnhen no faa no wɔ n’ahendzi mu afe a otsia awɔtwe no mu."

column2: "Na ɔsoaa EWURADZE ne fie akoradze nyinara
column3: na ɔhen no ne fie akoradze fii hɔ kɔree
column4: na otwitwaa sika ndzɛmba a Israelhen Solomon yɛe no wɔ EWURADZE n’asɔrdan no mu no nyinara mu esinesin
column5: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE see no ara."

column2: "Na ɔsoaa Jerusalɛm nyinara
column4: na mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam no nyinara
column7: na edwimfo na atomfo nyinara; obiara annka gyedɛ asaase no do nkorɔfo ehiafo neminemi no nkotsee."

column2: "Na ɔfaa Jehoiakin kɔr Babilɔn; na ɔhen no ne na
column5: na asaase no do nyimpa tsitsir no
column6: ɔsoaa hɔn fi Jerusalɛm kɔr Babilɔn ndɔmmum mu."

column2: "Na mbarimba akatakyi nyinara
column4: na edwimfo na atomfo nyimpa apem
column5: hɔn nyinara dɔm mbarimba a wɔfata ɔsa kɔ
column6: mekyerɛ woyinom na Babilɔnhen no faa hɔn ndɔmmum kɔr Babilɔn."

column2: "Na Babilɔnhen no hyɛɛ n’egya no nua Mattania ɔhen wɔ n’ananmu
"Aber a Zedekia hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe eduonu biako; na odzii hen mfe dubiako wɔ Jerusalɛm na ne na ne dzin dze Hamutal
column3: Jeremia a ofi Libna no ne babaa a."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Jehoiakim yɛe no nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔnam EWURADZE n’ebufuw do na ɔbaa dɛm wɔ Jerusalɛm na Juda
column3: dze kodur dɛ ɔtoow hɔn fii n’enyim gui: na Zedekia tseew Babilɔnhen no do etua."
